name: Crybaby (Carmy)
description:
Crybaby is a game inspired by The Binding of Isaac

It was made in 2 weeks with a funny youtube video about its creation:
https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=carmy+games+i+remade+isaac+as+a+fir...

20 - 30 minutes of playtime

Original The Binding of Isaac:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/250900/The_Binding_of_Isaac_Rebirth/

How to play:

  • WASD - movement
  • LMB - shoot
  • E - throw the bomb

THANK YOU FOR PLAYING.  PLEASE LEAVE FEEDBACK AS COMMENTS!
